title: Build a Pinterest Clone App
description: A full-stack Pinterest-like app with user login, pin uploads, and image boards. Built using React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and styled with Tailwind CSS.

title: Country Information System
description: A responsive app showing population, language, and region details of countries. Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and a public REST API.

title: Landing Page for Sales/Booking
description: A responsive sales landing page built with WordPress, JavaScript, and CSS. Optimized for mobile devices, fast loading, and SEO-friendly layout.
